summary: A test suite that validates EC2 fleet operations—including spot and on-demand fleets—using a mocked AWS environment. It covers creation, configuration, tagging, price selection, and deletion of fleets, as well as proper handling of launch templates.
business_intent: To verify that EC2 fleet management functionality works correctly and reliably, ensuring that compute resources can be provisioned, configured, and cleaned up as expected in production workloads.
